message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do better than $90, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
